name: @nxyzinc/xyzapi
description: SDK and Typescript type definitions for nxyz API
author: Joshua Davis <joshua@n.xyz>

scripts.update: mv package.json index.ts ./../../ ; rm -R ./* ; openapi-generator generate -i https://api.n.xyz/api.json --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,typescriptThreePlus=true -g typescript  -o /tmp/typescript ; cp -R /tmp/typescript/* ./ ; rm -R /tmp/typescript/* ; mv -f ./../../package.json ./../../index.ts ./ ; npm install
